title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 187.2 - Submission of requests for inspection or copies of records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 187.2 - Submission of requests for inspection or copies of records

State Regulations

The following offices of the department are designated to
receive requests for inspection and copies of records of the department, and
requests for the identification or amendment or correction of records of the
department relating to a data subject. All such requests shall be in
writing. ALBANY
New York State Education Department

Records Access Officer

Room 121

State Education Building

Albany, NY 12234

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
